lines.text: You're my only truly sick friend, Susan.
If it's a choice between me ending up a cocktail waitress or Paul being dead, there's just no contest.

[to Bill and Steve]
Paul is alive you stupid fucks!

[on the phone]
Susan?
Yes?
Paul's going to be all right.
Shit!
What is it?
Paul's going to be all right.
Shit!
Fuck!
Damn it!
Hi shortcake, how're you feeling?
Better now... give me a kiss.
[puckers up, Betty gives him a peck on the lips]
You call that a kiss?

[on the phone]
Betty?
Who's this?
It's Sam.
Gee Sam, how do you shoot a guy 3 times at close range and not kill him?
I don't know, you'll have to ask Bill and Steve that when you see them.
She'll have to ask us what, Sam?

[to Betty]
I met you through Susan, didn't I? You know how much she has to gain if I die before I rewrite my will, you do know that don't you?
Why do you have that look on your face?
I thought I could do it, I thought I could do anything for enough money...
Do you know the guys who shot me?
Yes... they're just two guys I know, it's Sam and Susan, it's Susan's plan, it was her idea, not mine.
To kill me?
Yes.
